ResponseID.description: Unique identifier for each response record.

Respondent.description: Anonymized identifier for the subject matter expert (SME).

ScenarioNumber.description: Sequential number representing the scenario order.

ScenarioLabel.description: Descriptive label of the scenario used in the RFI.

QuestionType.description: Category of the question, such as RouteEvaluation, RiskEvaluation, or DataRecord.

ResponseText.description: The raw text response provided by the SME for the given question.

SourceDate.description: Date Excel file received from RAM/SME. (ISO format).

FollowupNeeded.description: Indicates whether further clarification or follow-up with the SME is required.

Status.description: Status of the record (e.g., Draft, Reviewed, Final).

Version.description: Version label assigned to this merged data batch.

ChangeNote.description: Short note describing what changed in this merge or version.
